Home » 40P17 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
24 Saṃkiliṭṭhattika, Kusalattika
Saṃkiliṭṭhattika, Kusalattika
41.
112Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
113Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
114Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
115Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
